main event: A reported unidentified flying object was observed in St. Louis, Missouri on 2 May 1948 at 2100 CDT. The sighting took place after dark, with a full moon out.
interesting points: The length of observation is not specified in the report, leaving the duration of the sighting unclear.
The size of the observed object is not recorded, potentially limiting the details available about the sighting.
The report indicates that there was one ground observer present during the sighting.
The 'Remarks' section suggests that the observed object was identified as a 'Bird', indicating a prosaic explanation for the sighting.
The Project Blue Book evaluations mention other sightings categorized as 'Non-astronomical, with no explanation evident', highlighting the presence of unexplained UFO reports.
